scripts.build:yarn: yarn set version stable && yarn plugin import @yarnpkg/plugin-workspace-tools && yarn plugin import @yarnpkg/plugin-typescript
scripts.build:directories: rm -rf publish && mkdir -p publish/hm-walls/dist publish/hm-walls-api/dist publish/material-test
scripts.build:nobuild: yarn install && cp *.*js publish/ && cp *.html publish/ && cp *.css publish/ && cp -r hm-grid publish/hm-grid && cp -r design publish/design
scripts.build:workspaces: yarn workspaces focus --all && yarn workspaces foreach -v --exclude heretic-monkey.link run build
scripts.build:predeploy: cp -r hm-walls-api/dist publish/hm-walls-api/dist && cp -r material-test/dist publish/material-test
scripts.build: yarn run build:yarn && yarn run build:directories && yarn run build:nobuild && yarn run build:workspaces && yarn run build:predeploy
